data.title: William H. Lewis
data.text:
William is based out of the firm’s Raleigh, North Carolina office which he helped launch in January, 2020 after spending eight years practicing in the firm’s Hartford, Connecticut office. Although located in North Carolina, William continues to represent and serve clients in both Connecticut and North Carolina.

William is a Durham, North Carolina native and currently lives in Raleigh, North Carolina, with his wife, a pediatrician at UNC Hospital and their dog Vinny.
